name: Save The Dino
description:
◆◆◆100% FREE GOOD DINO WEEKEND SALE!!!◆◆◆ It's all about our favourite thing: DINOS! So we're giving it to you for FREE this weekend! Download today! Live it, Love it, and please give us a 5 STAR rating in the app store!

-"Save The Dino is an ingenious puzzle game. This is one you do not want to miss!" *Editor's Pick* ◆AppSaga.com◆
-"5 Stars! Innovatria has created one hell of a good puzzle game!" ◆Jurassic Park Gamer◆
"Awesomesauce! This game is Tetris meets Angry Birds meets Jurassic Park! 5 Stars!"-user review

◆2 Amazing Games in ONE!◆

◆Build. Grow. Protect! Save the Dino!◆

It's the dino apocalypse! Travel back 65 million years and protect your group of irresistible dinos from extinction! Battle it out against nature's fury, and grow your dinos through 2 awesome game modes, 20 unique growth stages, across many prehistoric environments and over a dozen types of natural disasters!

Build. Grow. Protect! Save the Dino!

◆Disastrix mode:

Just keep building! Build a tower of blocks around your dino while 14 types of disasters wreak havoc on your structure! Endless puzzle-action gameplay with dino-grow technology! How many waves can you survive in the dino apocalypse?

◆Constructrix mode:

50+ Levels of awesome physics based smashable puzzles! Build a glorious structure using as many unique pieces at your disposal! Protect your dino as nature unleashes destruction!

◆5 loveable dinos brought to life with top-notch quality graphics, irresistible animations, and impactful sound effects, including:

T-Rex
Stegasaurus
Raptor
Triceratops
Parasaur

◆If you love dinos as much as we do, this is your game!

This app is universal, and supports iPhone 4 and above, and iPad 2 and above.

For more info, visit: www.savethedino.com
